sentences.en: As a beginner , shes still fallible.
sentences.cn: 她初出茅庐,仍然是轻易出错的.

sentences.en: Efficient market theory is highly fallible, but it may still be better than anything else.
sentences.cn: 有效市场理论高度易错, 但是比别的也许仍然好.

sentences.en: Everyone is fallible to some degree.
sentences.cn: 每个人在某种程度上都有错误.

sentences.en: Everyone of us is fallible. How to rectify our errors is the main point.
sentences.cn: 我们每人都会犯错, 如何把错误改正过来才是重点.

sentences.en: For we are fallible. We make mistakes andthe temptations of pride and power, and sometimes evil.
sentences.cn: 人难免要犯错误, 我们会做错事,我们会受自负、权力 、 有时甚至邪念所诱.

sentences.en: Human reason is a fallible guide.
sentences.cn: 人的理智会给人错误的指引。
记忆有选择性而且会出错。

sentences.en: Pleasure is by no means an infallible critical guide, but it is the least fallible.
sentences.cn: 愉悦不是一贯正确的批评标准, 但它却是最保险的.

sentences.en: The paper says it is generally agreed that the memories of adults and children are fallible.
sentences.cn: 论文指出,普遍认为成年人和儿童的记忆不可靠.

sentences.en: The technicians in scientific research institute and papermaking enterprise often face many calculations, which and fallible.
sentences.cn: 在科研院所 、 造纸企业中技术人员经常与各种计算公式打交道.

sentences.en: These surveys are often a rather fallible guide to public opinion.
sentences.cn: 这些调查往往会对舆论产生误导。

sentences.en: They are only human and all too fallible.
sentences.cn: 他们只不过是普通人，太容易犯错误了。

sentences.en: We're fallible , so we make mistakes.

words.tran_cn: 说谎；假话；不真实；错误的信仰

trans.tran_en: able to make mistakes or be wrong
